item.create_logistics_by_shh.portable_st: Allows you to connect to a _Stock Ticker_ and remotely view its stock information.
If in the _same dimension_ as the connected _Stock Ticker_ and a _Stock Keeper_ exists, opens the request menu.
When used in Sneak on Blocks
If the target block is a _Stock Ticker_, connects to it.
text.create_logistics_by_shh.portable_st: Not connected to a Stock Ticker
Stock Ticker is in different dimension.
